title: Drawing Our Relationship: Love Sketchbook - Novel Updates
genre: Mature   School Life   Shounen Ai   Slice of Life
author: 美　倭古
description: Naoto Tachibana and Yoichi Yuki meet again for the first time in eight years after a bitter and sad breakup. The circumstances surrounding them have changed drastically; Yoichi is now a father of two kids and the president of a famous luxury hotel. Naoto has also grown up to be a famous painter as he had hoped, but his paintings are different from the ones he used to paint after he lost Yoichi. The story progresses from the sweet and sad high school days when the two met to the present day, and the love between Naoto and Yoichi is told along with the beautiful world of Naoto’s paintings. What will become of their love?>
